metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6607 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: SQLite before 3.8.9, as used in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T, allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 20099586.

notes.Note: sbeattie> all of CVE-2015-3414, CVE-2015-3415, CVE-2015-3416, upgrade to sqlite 3.8.9 in android

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
